participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.background: i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

content.text: that s always fun i play video games to keep my life interesting
